participant_1.background:
I am a couponer and I need to be close to the grocery store to maximize my savings.
I stayed home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, for my birthday.
I like to wear comfortable, casual clothing when I'm watching TV or movies.
I am a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
I am not sure what ethnicity I am, but I'm proud of my heritage.

many people want to be my friend.
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.
i write childrens books.

content.text: What do you like to do in your spare time?
I like to go to the lake, write children's books, and make new friends.  What do you do?
I am a software engineer but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.  I also like to stay home with my cat, Leroy Jenkins, on my birthday.  Do you have any pets?
I don't have any pets but I would love to have a cat.  I think cats are so cute and cuddly.  Where do you live?
I live in a small town in the Midwest.  It's a very quiet and peaceful place to live.  I love it here.
That sounds like a lovely place to live.  I live in a big city in the East Coast.  It's very busy and noisy but I love it here too.  It's a great place to be creative.
I could see how it would be fun to live in a big city.  There are always so many things to do and see.
Yes, there is always something new to experience.  I love the hustle and bustle of the city.
It sounds like you have a very exciting life.
I do!  I love trying new things and meeting new people.  I'm always up for an adventure.
I'm glad to hear that.  I think it's important to keep an open mind and try new things.  It's the only way to grow and learn.
I agree.  I think it's important to experience all that life has to offer
